title: Otter AI â€” AI Tool Review
description: Otter AI transcribes meetings in real time and generates AI-powered summaries, action items, and follow-up emails automatically. Otter AI is an AI meeting assistant that provides real-time transcription for Zoom, Teams, and Google Meet, then automatically generates summaries, action items, and follow-up email drafts. It integrates with calendar apps to join meetings automatically. Widely used by sales teams, journalists, students, and business professionals. Highlights: Real-time meeting transcription. Automatic meeting summaries. Action item extraction. Calendar integration for auto-join. Works with Zoom, Teams, Google Meet.
